function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of NMF and LDA in analyzing COVID-19 public media dataset","Impact":"Misinterpretation of topic meaning and prevalence leading to incorrect conclusions","Mitigation":"Careful validation of topic coherence and cross-referencing with domain expertise","Technologies":"NMF, LDA","People":"Data analysts, researchers","Owner":"Data analysts, researchers"}]}
